Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.sun.jna.platform.win32.Variant.COM_DAYS_ADJUSTMENT
    com.sun.jna.platform.win32.Variant.MICRO_SECONDS_PER_DAY
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.sun.jna.platform.win32.Ole32.CLSIDFromString(WString, Guid.CLSID.ByReference)
    use the String version
    com.sun.jna.platform.win32.Ole32.CoCreateGuid(Guid.GUID.ByReference)
    use Ole32.CoCreateGuid(Guid.GUID).
    com.sun.jna.platform.win32.Kernel32Util.formatMessageFromHR(WinNT.HRESULT)
    use Kernel32Util.formatMessage(WinNT.HRESULT) instead.
    com.sun.jna.platform.win32.Variant.VARIANT.fromJavaDate(Date)
    com.sun.jna.Native.getDirectByteBuffer(long, long)
    Use Pointer.getByteBuffer(long, long) (since 4.3.0)
    com.sun.jna.platform.unix.LibCAPI.getdomainname(char[], int)
    use com.sun.jna.platform.unix.LibCAPI.getdomainname(byte[], int)
    com.sun.jna.platform.unix.LibCAPI.gethostname(char[], int)
    use com.sun.jna.platform.unix.LibCAPI.gethostname(byte[], int)
    com.sun.jna.Native.getPreserveLastError()
    Last error is always preserved and available via Native.getLastError()
    com.sun.jna.Pointer.getString(long, boolean)
    use Pointer.getString(long,String) or Pointer.getWideString(long) instead.
    com.sun.jna.Pointer.getStringArray(long, boolean)
    use Pointer.getStringArray(long,String) or Pointer.getWideStringArray(long) instead.
    com.sun.jna.Pointer.getStringArray(long, int, boolean)
    use Pointer.getStringArray(long,int,String) or Pointer.getWideStringArray(long,int) instead.
    com.sun.jna.Platform.isAix() 
    com.sun.jna.platform.win32.OleAuto.LoadTypeLib(WString, PointerByReference)
    use the String version
    com.sun.jna.platform.win32.User32.MonitorFromPoint(WinDef.POINT, int)
    Use User32.MonitorFromPoint(com.sun.jna.platform.win32.WinDef.POINT.ByValue, int)
    com.sun.jna.Native.parseVersion(String)
    com.sun.jna.platform.unix.LibCAPI.setdomainname(char[], int)
    use com.sun.jna.platform.unix.LibCAPI.setdomainname(String, int)
    com.sun.jna.Structure.setFieldOrder(String[])
    Use the required method getFieldOrder() instead to indicate the order of fields in this structure.
    com.sun.jna.platform.unix.LibCAPI.sethostname(char[], int)
    use com.sun.jna.platform.unix.LibCAPI.sethostname(String, int)
    com.sun.jna.Native.setPreserveLastError(boolean)
    Last error is always preserved and available via Native.getLastError()
    com.sun.jna.Pointer.setString(long, String, boolean)
    use Pointer.setWideString(long,String) instead.
    com.sun.jna.platform.win32.Variant.VARIANT.toJavaDate(OaIdl.DATE)
    com.sun.jna.platform.win32.WinBase.FILETIME.toLong()
    Replaced by WinBase.FILETIME.toTime()
